name: Spellbind (itch) (pigeon wings)
description:
Untitled Game Jam #38

Theme: Minimalism

You play as a witch who is trapped inside her spellbook, whatever the story doesnt matter lol.

My goal was to create as much gameplay with as few objects as possible. The result is a sort of dungeon crawler with randomly generated levels and one enemy type that spawns with random attributes.

In total, there are only 3 objects and 1 room, but the game is infinite (i tested up to chapter 1000).

Hopefully, each level presents a unique challenge, and all the assets are worth more than the sum of their parts
